enGB: You may use your {g}Strength{/g} modifier in place of your {g}Dexterity{/g} modifier for your attack rolls when making a ranged attack with thrown weapons. You may also use the Power Attack feat instead of the Deadly Aim feat when attacking with thrown weapons.
zhCN: 你使用{g}力量{/g}调整值取代{g}敏捷{/g}调整值，来计算使用投掷武器时的远程攻击检定。同时你也可以对远程投掷武器应用猛力攻击专长，来替代致命瞄准。

enGB:
{g|Encyclopedia:Size}Size{/g}: Large
{g|Encyclopedia:Speed}Speed{/g}: 50 ft.
{g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}: +4 natural armor
{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}Attacks{/g}: bite ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g}), 2 hooves (1d6)
{g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}Ability scores{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Str{/g} 16, {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dex{/g} 13, {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Con{/g} 15, {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Int{/g} 2, {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wis{/g} 12, {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Cha{/g} 6
Special qualities: {g|Encyclopedia:Scent}scent{/g}
At 4th level, a horse gains Str +2 and Con +2 and its hoof attacks become primary.
When riding a horse, you gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to AC and on attack rolls against enemies of Medium size or smaller.
zhCN:
{g|Encyclopedia:Size}体型{/g}：大型
{g|Encyclopedia:Speed}速度{/g}: 50 尺.
{g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}防御等级{/g}: +4 天生防御
{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻击{/g}: 啮咬 ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g}), 2 蹄踢 (1d6)
{g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}属性值{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}力量{/g} 16, {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}敏捷{/g} 13, {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}体质{/g} 15, {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}智力{/g} 2, {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}感知{/g} 12, {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}魅力{/g} 6
特性: {g|Encyclopedia:Scent}灵敏嗅觉{/g}
达到4级后，马的力量+2，体质+2，蹄踢成为主要攻击。
骑马对抗中等体型或更小的敌人时，防御等级与攻击检定获得+1{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。

enGB:
Reddit's own character class. CHA TO EVERYTHING! 
Basically Fighter class with +CHA to all stats and CHA spellcasting. (This is a meme class I made, don't take it too seriously)'

魅力上一切的网红职业！
拥有魅力上一切和魅力施法的战士。（这是纯粹的娱乐职业，别太认真了）

enGB: Swordmasters are proficient with all simpe and martial swords, plut the quarterstaff. They are proficient with light armor, but not with shields.
zhCN: Swordmasters are proficient with all simpe and martial swords, plut the quarterstaff. They are proficient with light armor, but not with shields.

enGB: You gain two wing attacks. These are secondary natural attacks that each deal 2d8 damage
zhCN: 你获得两次翼击攻击（2d8伤害），视为次要天生攻击。

enGB: A swordmaster meditates to strengthen her spiritual connection to her blade. She strives to perfect her skills by mastering six deadly trances.
zhCN: 剑术宗师通过冥想增强她的精神与剑刃之联接。并力求通过默想使用六种体势将她的技法发挥至极致。

enGB: A swordmaster meditates to strengthen her spiritual connection to her blade. She strives to perfect her skills by mastering six deadly trances.
zhCN: 剑术宗师通过冥想增强她的精神与剑刃之联接。并力求通过默想使用六种体势将她的技法发挥至极致。

enGB: At 3rd level, the swordmaster chooses one trance from the list below. She chooses another trance at 6th, 9th, 12th, 15th, and 18th level. She can only use one type of trance at a time.
zhCN: 3级起，剑术宗师可以从下列列出的默想体势中选择一种。在6级，9级，12级，15级以及18级时她可以选择分别选择一新的种默想体势。同一时间剑术宗师只能使用一种默想体势。

enGB: The swordmaster’s blade rises and falls with the graceful sweeping arcs of the mountain crane. When in this trance, a swordmaster gains the benefits of the Crane Style feat.
zhCN: 剑术宗师的剑刃划着优雅的圆弧上下舞动就如同那山中的青鹤一般。在这种默想体势中，剑术宗师获得鹤形拳专长的效果。

enGB: The swordmaster’s blade rises and falls with the graceful sweeping arcs of the mountain crane. When in this trance, a swordmaster gains the benefits of the Crane Style feat.
zhCN: 剑术宗师的剑刃划着优雅的圆弧上下舞动就如同那山中的青鹤一般。在这种默想体势中，剑术宗师获得鹤形拳专长的效果。

enGB: The swordmaster’s blade rises and falls with the graceful sweeping arcs of the mountain crane. When in this trance, a swordmaster gains the benefits of the Crane Style feat.
zhCN: 剑术宗师的剑刃划着优雅的圆弧上下舞动就如同那山中的青鹤一般。在这种默想体势中，剑术宗师获得鹤形拳专长的效果。

enGB: Like the dragon, the swordmaster has honed the steadiness of her mind and body. When in this trance, a swordmaster gains the benefits of the Dragon Style feat.
zhCN: 剑术宗师将她的身心磨练得如同巨龙一般稳固。在这种默想体势中，剑术宗师获得龙形拳专长的效果。

enGB: Like the dragon, the swordmaster has honed the steadiness of her mind and body. When in this trance, a swordmaster gains the benefits of the Dragon Style feat.
zhCN: 剑术宗师将她的身心磨练得如同巨龙一般稳固。在这种默想体势中，剑术宗师获得龙形拳专长的效果。

enGB: Like the dragon, the swordmaster has honed the steadiness of her mind and body. When in this trance, a swordmaster gains the benefits of the Dragon Style feat.
zhCN: 剑术宗师将她的身心磨练得如同巨龙一般稳固。在这种默想体势中，剑术宗师获得龙形拳专长的效果。

enGB: Using the swiftness of the leopard, a swordmaster’s evasive footwork confuses her opponents. When in this trance, a swordmaster gains the benefits of the Mobility feat.
zhCN: 剑术宗师使用那豹子般迅捷闪烁的步法迷惑她的敌人。在这种默想体势中，剑术宗师获得灵活移动专长的效果。

enGB: Using the swiftness of the leopard, a swordmaster’s evasive footwork confuses her opponents. When in this trance, a swordmaster gains the benefits of the Mobility feat.

enGB: As the monkey springs, the swordmaster leaps from the reach of her enemies. While in this trance, a swordmaster gains the benefits of the Trip feat and Fury's Fall feat.
zhCN: 就如同猿猴一般灵活，剑术宗师跳离敌人的进攻范围。在这种默想体势中，剑术宗师获得绊摔和欲魔落袭专长的效果。

enGB: As the monkey springs, the swordmaster leaps from the reach of her enemies. While in this trance, a swordmaster gains the benefits of the Trip feat and Fury's Fall feat.

enGB: As the monkey springs, the swordmaster leaps from the reach of her enemies. While in this trance, a swordmaster gains the benefits of the Trip feat and Fury's Fall feat.

enGB: Like the serpent, the swordmaster’s quick movements allow her to catch her opponent unawares. While in this trance, a swordmaster gains the benefits of the Feint feat with a +4 bonus to Feint.
zhCN: 剑术宗师的如蛇一般迅捷的突袭使她的敌人措不及防。在这种默想体势中，剑术宗师获得佯攻专长的效果并在佯攻上获得+4加值。

enGB: Like the serpent, the swordmaster’s quick movements allow her to catch her opponent unawares. While in this trance, a swordmaster gains the benefits of the Feint feat with a +4 bonus to Feint.

enGB: The swordmaster pounces upon her opponents, striking with the ferocity and brute force of a wild tiger. While in this trance, a swordmaster gains the benefits of the Pounce feat.
zhCN: 剑术宗师对她的对手进行突袭，就好似凶暴残忍的野生猛虎一般。在这种默想体势中，剑术宗师获得猛扑专长的效果。

enGB: Adds Perception and Mobility to list of class skills. She also is able to use her curse to qualify for feats that require lycanthropy.
zhCN: 将精准和灵巧技能加入本职技能。同时也能使用这诅咒来满足需要兽化的专长条件。

enGB: Allows the Swordmaster to enter 2 trances at a time

zhCN: 你如此擅长这项超魔技艺，可以不需要额外消耗就将其应用。

enGB: Enable to give your spells Intensify through your mythic power!
zhCN: 允许你通过神话力量给予你的法术强化超魔。

enGB: Spells will have Intensify applied to them
zhCN: 法术被应用了强化超魔

enGB: Spells will have Piercing applied to them
zhCN: 法术被应用了穿刺超魔

zhCN: 允许你通过神话力量给予你的法术燃烧超魔。

enGB: Spells will have Burning applied to them
zhCN: 法术被应用了燃烧超魔

zhCN: 法术被应用了激励超魔

zhCN: 允许你通过神话力量给予你的法术闪耀超魔。

enGB: Spells will have Flaring applied to them
zhCN: 法术被应用了闪耀超魔

enGB: You become so familiar with the metamagic that you can apply it at will with no additional cost.
zhCN: 你如此擅长这项超魔技艺，可以不需要额外消耗就将其应用。

enGB: Enable to give your spells Rime through your mythic power!
zhCN: 允许你通过神话力量给予你的法术霜冻超魔。

enGB: Spells will have Rime applied to them
zhCN: 法术被应用了霜冻超魔

enGB: You become so familiar with the metamagic that you can apply it at will with no additional cost.
zhCN: 你如此擅长这项超魔技艺，可以不需要额外消耗就将其应用。

enGB: Enable to give your spells Solid Shadows through your mythic power!
zhCN: 允许你通过神话力量给予你的法术实体幽影超魔。

enGB: Spells will have Solid Shadows applied to them
zhCN: 法术被应用了实体幽影超魔

enGB: A blast of heavenfire blazes from your hands. You can fire one ray, plus one additional ray for every 4 {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g} beyond 11th (to a maximum of three rays at 19th level). Each ray requires a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} to hit and deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per caster level (maximum 15d6). Half the damage is {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g}, but the other half results directly from holy power and is therefore not subject to being reduced by fire {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resistance{/g}.
zhCN: 你从手中射出天堂烈焰。你可以发射1道射线，11级之后，每提升4个{g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}施法者等级{/g}，你就可以再发射1道射线（19级时达到最高，即3道射线）。每道射线都需要进行远程{g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}接触攻击{/g}检定来命中目标，并可造成每施法者等级{g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g}点{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}（最大值为15d6点）。该{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}一半为火焰伤害，另一半为神圣伤害，因此火焰{g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}抗性{/g}不能减免这部分伤害。

enGB: You unleash a massive blast of energy that detonates upon all in the AoE, dealing 20d6 fire, 20d6 acid, 20d6 electrical and 20d6 sonic damage. A reflex save halves damage.
zhCN: 你释放一个巨大的能量爆，在范围区域引爆，造成20d6火焰，20d6酸蚀，20d6电击和20d6音波伤害。反射豁免能够减半伤害。

enGB: Grants you a new powerful spell called Hellbell, which does 10d6 damage of multiple elements! Requires being able to cast spell level 9.
zhCN: 给予你被称为地狱之球的强力法术，造成多种元素的10d6伤害。需要能够释放9级法术。

enGB: The hematite head of this +1 earth breaker crackles with electricity, dealing an additional 1d6 points of electricity and 1d6 points of sonic damage on each hit.
zhCN: 这把+1裂地锤的赤铁矿锤头萦绕着电光，每次命中时会额外造成1d6点电击伤害和1d6点音波伤害。

enGB: Deals an additional 1d6 points of electricity and 1d6 points of sonic damage on each hit.
zhCN: 每次命中时会额外造成1d6点电击伤害和1d6点音波伤害。

enGB: Gives you +1 bonus to both crit range and crit multiplier. (Gives these bonuses for all weapons/unarmed, despite needing Improved Crit & Improved Crit Mythic)
zhCN: 使你的重击范围与重击倍率均获得+1加值。（此加值适用于所有武器/徒手攻击，即使需要精通重击及其神话专长）

enGB: 3 times per day, Storval's Thunder can call down a thunder clap on an enemy. If they fail a {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 20 Fortitude save, they are stunned for one round. (period for Hero of Cows)
zhCN: 每日3次，斯托瓦尔之雷可对敌人降下雷鸣震击。若其未通过{g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g}20的强韧豁免，则震慑1轮。（给奶牛英雄的句号）

enGB:
This metal +1 klar is shaped like the head of a storm roc, whose sharp feathers serve as the klar’s spikes, and it hums and crackles like a distant stormy sky. When used to make a shield bash attack, a Storval’s fang deals an additional 1d6 points of sonic damage. In addition, the wielder gains electricity resistance 10.
If the wielder of a Storval’s Fang also wields a Storval’s Thunder and uses the Thunder and Fang feat, Storval’s Thunder deals an additional 2d6 points of electricity damage and the DCs to negate their critical hit effects increase by 5.
zhCN:
这面+1金属刺盾被塑造成风暴巨鹏的头颅形状，其锋利的羽毛构成了盾钉，并如遥远的风暴天空般嗡鸣作响。当用于进行盾牌猛击时，斯托瓦尔之牙额外造成1d6点音波伤害。此外，持用者获得10点电击抗力。
若斯托瓦尔之牙的持用者同时持用斯托瓦尔之雷并使用雷牙双绝专长，则斯托瓦尔之雷额外造成2d6点电击伤害，且其重击效果对应的豁免DC提高5点。

enGB: If the wielder of a Storval’s Fang also wields a Storval’s Thunder and uses the Thunder and Fang feat, Storval’s Thunder deals an additional 2d6 points of electricity damage and the DCs to negate their critical hit effects increase by 5.
zhCN: 若斯托瓦尔之牙的持用者同时持用斯托瓦尔之雷并使用雷牙双绝专长，则斯托瓦尔之雷额外造成2d6点电击伤害，且其重击效果对应的豁免DC提高5点。

enGB: Ring of Tomek, the Eternally Green. His hatred is so skilled, that his ring adds your CHA modifier to your AC as a Profane bonus.
zhCN: 永恒之绿托梅克的戒指。他的憎恨技艺精湛，以至于其戒指能以亵渎加值形式将你的魅力调整值加至AC。

enGB: Ring of Tomek, the Eternally Green. His hatred is so skilled, that his ring adds your CHA modifier to your AC as a Profane bonus.
zhCN: 永恒之绿托梅克的戒指。他的憎恨技艺精湛，以至于其戒指能以亵渎加值形式将你的魅力调整值加至AC。

enGB:
The shining sun of Sarenrae, the twinkling stars of Desna, and the shimmering rainbow of Shelyn come together to form the Radiant Prism, a relatively small pantheon worshipped by those who actively fight against evil to protect the innocent. These three goddesses have been romantically involved with one another from time to time, so it makes sense that they would form a coalition. In addition to defeating the wicked, the Radiant Prism promotes the creation of beautiful works of art to bring more grace to the world.
Though devotees of the Radiant Prism are tasked with battling all sources of evil, they are encouraged to refrain from becoming ruthless butchers. The wicked must be offered the chance to capitulate once it becomes clear their defeat is inevitable. Sarenrae’s compassion is a major pillar of the pantheon, and priests of the Radiant Prism attempt to redeem their enemies where possible. Of course, some creatures are remorseless in their evil (such as fiends and some undead), and the Radiant Prism doesn’t expect their worshippers to waste their lives trying to save such beings.
zhCN:
莎恩芮的闪耀烈阳、德丝娜的闪烁繁星与雪琳的璀璨虹光汇聚成辉光棱镜，这是一个相对较小的神系，受那些积极对抗邪恶以保护无辜者的人们所崇拜。这三位女神彼此间不时卷入浪漫关系，因此她们结成同盟合情合理。除了击败邪恶，辉光棱镜还提倡创造美丽的艺术品，为世界增添更多优雅。
尽管辉光棱镜的信徒肩负着对抗所有邪恶源头的使命，但他们被鼓励避免沦为无情的屠夫。一旦恶徒的败局已定，必须给予他们投降的机会。莎恩芮的慈悲是此神系的主要支柱，辉光棱镜的祭司们会尽可能尝试救赎敌人。当然，某些生物在其邪恶中毫无悔意（如魔鬼和某些亡灵），辉光棱镜并不期望其信徒浪费生命去试图拯救此类存在。

enGB:
The ring is imbued with the hope that having a heavy body will make your attacks better.
Adds your CON bonus to your Critical range.
zhCN:
此戒指注入了“拥有沉重之躯将使你的攻击更佳”的期许。
将你的体质调整值加至重击范围。

enGB: With your Mythic PowerTM, you can now add your Dex bonus to your attack's damage with long bows and short bows, replacing your Str bonus.
zhCN: 凭借你的神话之力™，你现在可以在使用长弓与短弓进行攻击时，将敏捷调整值（取代力量调整值）加至伤害。

enGB:
Strongman's Necklace make's it's user's skin as tough as their Strength!
Adds STR bonus to DR.
zhCN:
壮士项链令佩戴者的皮肤坚韧如其力量！
将力量调整值加至伤害减免（DR）。

enGB: Allows the wearer to cast For The King.
zhCN: 允许佩戴者施放“为了吾王”。

enGB:
You've learned a way to increase the number of uses of your All is Darkness ability.
Benefit: You can use All is Darnkess a number of additional times per day equal to half your mythic rank.
zhCN:
你已学会增加“无光绝境”能力使用次数的方法。
效果：你每日可额外使用“无光绝境”的次数等于你神话阶层的一半。

enGB:
These bracers were crafted by a blacksmith for those strange people who try to hit multiple people with one arrow.
Allows the user to cleave with ranged weapons in a 30ft radius of themself.
zhCN:
这副护腕由铁匠为那些试图一箭射中多人的怪人所打造。
允许使用者在自身30英尺半径范围内，使用远程武器发动顺势斩。

enGB:
This ring is imbued with the willpower of a very successful mage.
Lowers arcane spell failure by 25.
zhCN:
此戒指注入了某位极其成功的法师的意志力。
降低25%奥术失败率。

enGB: At 1st level, affected allies gain a +2 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Wisdom{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} and a +1 morale bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throws{/g}, but they also take a –1 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}. At 4th level and every 4 skald levels thereafter, the song's bonus on Will saves increases by 1; the penalty to AC doesn't change. At 8th and 16th levels, the song's bonuses to Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma increase by 2. (Unlike the barbarian's rage ability, those affected are not {g|ConditionFatigued}fatigued{/g} after the song ends.)
zhCN: 1级起，受影响盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}智力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}感知{/g}和{g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}魅力属性{/g}获得+2士气{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}意志豁免检定{/g}获得+1士气加值，但{g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}防御等级（AC）{/g}也会承受-1{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。4级时，以及之后每提升4级，歌曲对意志豁免的加值提高1点，防御等级（AC）上的减值则保持不变。8级和16级时，歌曲对智力和魅力属性的加值提高2点（和野蛮人的狂暴能力不同，被歌曲影响的生物在歌曲结束时不会陷入{g|ConditionFatigued}疲劳{/g}）。

enGB: By studying the teachings of Nethys, your spells have an increased difficulty class, with a bonus of 2.
zhCN: 研习魔法之神涅希斯的教义后，你的法术豁免难度提升，获得+2加值。

enGB: By studying the teachings of Nethys, your spells have an increased difficulty class, with an additional bonus of 4.
zhCN: 精研魔法之神涅希斯的教义后，你的法术豁免难度进一步提升，获得额外+4加值。

enGB: By studying the teachings of Nethys, your spells have an increased difficulty class, with an additional bonus of 2.
zhCN: 钻研魔法之神涅希斯的教义后，你的法术豁免难度提升，获得额外+2加值。

enGB: Nethys is so impressed with your dedication to his teachings, that he helps your spells difficult class grow even more. Bonus of +6
zhCN: 你对魔法之神的虔诚研习令涅希斯深感赞赏，祂亲自强化了你的法术威能。法术豁免难度获得+6加值。

enGB: Builds Enjoyer combines Inciter, Dronk, and Marine archetypes into one handy class!
zhCN: 融合滋事者、醉拳大师与深黯军团兵士三大变体，铸就这全能的传奇职业！

enGB: Builds Enjoyer combines Inciter, Drunken Monk, and Sable Marine archetypes into one handy class! Also gives Magic Deceiver spellbook at KC's request!
zhCN: 融合煽动者、醉拳大师与深黯军团兵士变体（应KC要求额外获得魔法诈欺师法术书）的全能职业。

enGB:
The Juggernaut's bodily consituation is so great, she can shrug off attacks.
At 2nd level, she gains DR/- equal to her CON bonus. This stacks with other sources of DR/-.
zhCN:
主宰的身躯强健程度让她可以忽视攻击。
2级起，她获得等于其体质加值的 DR/- ，可以和其它来源的 DR/- 叠加。

enGB: Juggernaut, DR focused Barbarian. Inspired by Rafantat on Discord
zhCN: 主宰，专注于减免伤害的野蛮人。

enGB: Juggernaut, DR focused Barbarian. Inspired by Rafantat on Discord
zhCN: 主宰，专注于减免伤害的野蛮人。

enGB: A Juggernaut is proficient with simple and martial weapons, and shields.
zhCN: 主宰擅长简易和军用武器，还有盾牌。

enGB: This stone grants you a +1 resistance bonus on saving throws. The bonuses from multiple amber spindles stack  (up to a maximum of a +5 resistance bonus to saving throws).
zhCN: 这块石头使你在豁免检定上获得+1抗力加值。多个琥珀纺锤的加值可叠加（最高为豁免检定提供+5抗力加值）。

enGB: This stone grants you a +2 enhancement bonus to Intelligence. The bonuses from multiple crimson spheres stack (up to a maximum of a +10 enhancement bonus to Intelligence).
zhCN: 这块石头使你的智力获得+2增强加值。多个深红圆石的加值可叠加（最高为智力提供+10增强加值）。
暗蓝菱形石 - 艾恩石

enGB: This stone grants the wearer the effects of the Alertness feat.
zhCN: 这块石头赋予佩戴者“警觉”专长的效果。

enGB: This stone grants you a +2 enhancement bonus to Dexterity. The bonuses from multiple crimson spheres stack (up to a maximum of a +10 enhancement bonus to Dexterity).
zhCN: 这块石头使你的敏捷获得+2增强加值。多个深红圆石的加值可叠加（最高为敏捷提供+10增强加值）。

enGB: This stone grants you a +1 resistance bonus on saving throws.
zhCN: 这块石头使你在豁免检定上获得+1抗力加值。

enGB: This stone grants you a +2 enhancement bonus to Intelligence.
zhCN: 这块石头使你的智力获得+2增强加值。

enGB: This stone grants the wearer the effects of the Alertness feat.
zhCN: 这块石头赋予佩戴者“警觉”专长的效果。

enGB: This stone grants you a +2 enhancement bonus to Dexterity.
zhCN: 这块石头使你的敏捷获得+2增强加值。

enGB: This stone grants you a +1 resistance bonus on saving throws.
zhCN: 这块石头使你在豁免检定上获得+1抗力加值。

enGB: This stone grants you a +2 enhancement bonus to Intelligence.
zhCN: 这块石头使你的智力获得+2增强加值。

enGB: This stone grants the wearer the effects of the Alertness feat.
zhCN: 这块石头赋予佩戴者“警觉”专长的效果。

enGB: This stone grants you a +2 enhancement bonus to Dexterity.
zhCN: 这块石头使你的敏捷获得+2增强加值。
